original_text: When the tabernacle is to set out, the Levites shall take it down, and when the tabernacle is to be pitched, the Levites shall set it up. And if any outsider comes near, he shall be put to death.
korean_text: 성막을 운반할 때에는 레위인이 그것을 걷고 성막을 세울 때에는 레위인이 그것을 세울 것이요 외인이 가까이 오면 죽일지며

sentences.original_text: When the tabernacle is to set out,
the Levites shall take it down,
and when the tabernacle is to be pitched,
the Levites shall set it up.
And if any outsider comes near,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 만일 낯선 사람이 가까이 오면,

sentences.original_text: he shall be put to death.
